text:
If a collection is deleted, the SysSymbols still contains references to the
collection.
creator: vladimir@bossicard.com

text:
morten svanæs [morten@web-som-virker.no] reports that old documents are not
being removed either upon Collection.remove()

text:
In current CVS old documents and collection directory are removed.
But SysSymbols still contains references to the collection.
